name: IN GAME
description: We manage our imprisoned character in the video game.In order to save our trapped character in the game, we have to move through each other's difficult platforms and get the character to the exit door.We must also defeat the enemy characters that will appear in the game.Our character has 50 arrows at the beginning.With these arrows, we can break the boxes in the game and open them.In addition, each platform is interconnected.Because of the decreasing hp on the platforms before, it will be very difficult for us to cross the next platforms.(This game is young two universities made by a small budget like $ 45.Because of the financial impossibilities, the game has been developed this far.)
